summary: this mod makes it available mix potions with same properties in cooking pot, there is no made up new potion effects, it just merges potions into stronger ones, also soul gem combine is available!
descriptionHtml:
[i][size=4]what is this mod about?[/size]
[/i]
hello, I did this mod because I cannot find anyone else tried to do this, normally there is other mods makes the same thing this mod does, but this is extended version with all vanilla potion types, others only just add recipe to health/stamina/magic.. this is different, so for example you can make stronger resist or damage potions with merging them togather..

NOTE: this doesn't apply user made potions

there isn't any scripts running with this mod so its user friendly to use and remove any time
there is no new potion types so you can enjoy vanilla game.. this mod just turns your cooking pots into witch cauldron :)

soul gem combining also available with this mod so you can make grand gems.. no more petty gems taking space from your house, now there is a good use of all soul gem types, there is also gem crushing available in recipes, now you can crush filled soul gems into pieces, it will give you one level decreased empty soul gem, so you can have more resource to craft grand soul gem, look for screenshots for better understanding..

NOTE: warning; if you just trying to combine empty soul gems, put your filled soul gems into safe place like a chest because you can crush your filled gems with a mistake, do not be confused between empty and filled gems (crushing empty or filled grand soul gem is unavailable)


[size=4]STRONGLY RECOMMENDED INSTALL THIS MOD ALONG THIS:[/size][size=4]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26558/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D26558%26preview%3D&pUp=1][size=4]Enhanced Better Sorting[/size]

[/url] [i]why?
[/i]because with this mod you can see the potion levels clearly, you can also see which potion you created
(I'm using "EBS - Potions (Vanilla Weight).esp" by the way)
